description: A simple wooden shield consisting of a single layer of leather stretched over a light wooden frame.  Tolerable weight but not very tough.

name.str_pl: wooden shields with guige

description: A simple wooden shield consisting of a single layer of leather stretched over a light wooden frame, with a leather guige attached to wear it on back when it's not in use.  Tolerable weight but not very tough.  Currently worn on front and ready to block attacks; activate it to wear it on back instead.

use_action.msg: You flip your %s to wear it on your back.
